Show Journal

Use the Show Journal dialog box (Actions | Show Journal) to select the parameters to show on the journal report. The journal report provides an audit trail of all modifications made to any archive, project, or project database using Serena ChangeMan Version Manager commands.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Restrict Report By User(s): To show changes made by certain Users, enter a User name or click the Browse button to select one.
Show only locked revisions: Select to show only currently locked revisions. If you entered user IDs in the User(s) field and select this check box, Version Manager will report the currently locked revisions of the Users specified.
Date Range From: Select the start date of the filter for the report. Click the browse button to display a calendar. Select a date by selecting a month and year and then clicking the date on the calendar.
Date Range To: Select the end date of the filter for the report. Click the browse button to display a calendar. Select a date by selecting a month and year and then clicking the date on the calendar.
Restrict by Action Check Out: Select to show only archives that have had revisions checked out.
Check In: Select to show only archives that have had revisions checked in.
Promote: Select to show only files that have had revisions promoted.
Delete Revision: Select to show only archives that have had revisions deleted.
Include files in subprojects (This field is only visible when a project or project database is selected.) Select to show the report for all projects and subprojects of the selected project database or project.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files for which a report will be generated.
Properties button Click to display properties information on the selected item.

See Also
